Reviews.Title: “Good quality/price”

Reviews.Content: close pigalle metro hotel 2 stars price paris clean beds confortable unfortunatly bathroom tiny redone price perfect breakfast included croissant half baguette person cheese people nice hotel perfect price

Reviews.Title: “Great location and nice front desk staff”
Reviews.Author: OliviaBrazil
Reviews.Content: stayed 7 nights st georges lafayette plane ticket lodging program sheets towels clean that´s paris breakfast poor glass orange juice cup coffee little butter little cream cheese croissant half baguette that´s cable tv limited phone location convenient close metro station supermarket nice restaurants paris hotel sleep it´s ok front desk staff helpful quiet night simple hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good location and good value for Paris”
Reviews.Author: Ian001
Reviews.Content: situated hotel near pigalle metro station close montmatre sacre coeur moulin rouge paris value rate included continental breakfast slight dingy musty broken shower base complaining told booked 3star hotel fine continental breakfast croissant bread cheese spread jam coffee base explore paris using public transport recommend buying daily travel pass funicular possibly carnet 10 single tickets explore paris possibly versailles relax la bar 74 rue des martyrs 100 metres west pigalle metro ambience

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay in Paris !”
Reviews.Author: Laura B
Reviews.Content: experience wondering hotel clean staff nice friendly nice smiling morning breakfast time home clean fresh towels home close walking distance train stations etc directions front desk time return return wonderful taxi pick time fear lose flight highly recomment hotel wonderful staff hav learned stars hotel wall treat respect care feel safe thank surely look forward seeing 2013 cant wait hugs boston

Reviews.Title: “A great value Budget hotel in Pigalle area”
Reviews.Author: DonnaMFriendly
Reviews.Content: found hotel advertised minutecom fantastic rate 2 nights bb paris situated close pigalle metro rue victor masse pretty quiet compared nearby husband love paris 10 minute walk montmartre perfectly adequate recently updated modern photos suggest plenty hot water shower head wasnt attached wall quiet run marathon exactly 2 nights sleep breakfast fine baguette croissant staff hotel extremely pleasant ignored 15 minutes late checking happy store bags arrived check recommend isnt offended pigalle street safe fancies spending cash paris instead hotel
